name: Extermination Alien: Rescuse F
description:
You have been sent to a planet covered with Alien. Your task is to survive as long as possible. Hunt down and shoot as many alien invaders as possible. This space alien game is action packed and loaded with Alien fun.
Features:
- Fully upgradable Snipers
- Super graphics.
- Great Effects.
- Top rated concepts.
- awesome Sounds that give you real feelings during play game.
